metadata.title: CVE-2017-0925 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Gitlab Enterprise Edition version 10.1.0 is vulnerable to an insufficientlyprotected credential issue in the project service integration API endpointresulting in an information disclosure of plaintext password.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
